abiDocs.name: getContent
abiDocs.notice: Gets the latest revision of the content at id contentId

abiDocs.name: removeRole
abiDocs.notice: Removes a string-based role from the specific address, requires ROLE_EDITOR to use

inputs.name: user
inputs.description: The address for which role check is done

inputs.name: role
inputs.description: A constant name of the role being checked

abiDocs.name: hasRole
abiDocs.notice: Returns whether a specific addres has a role. Keep in mind that the owner can override role checks

abiDocs.name: isOwner
abiDocs.notice: Returns if the specified address is owner of this smart-contract and thus can override any role checks

abiDocs.name: revisionCount
abiDocs.return: Number of revisions for a this content, 0 if never published

inputs.name: revisionId
inputs.description: Which revision in that get content to get

abiDocs.name: getRevision
abiDocs.notice: Gets a specific revision of the content. Each revision increases the ID from the previous one

abiDocs.name: addRole
abiDocs.notice: Adds a string-based role to the specific address, requires ROLE_EDITOR to use

inputs.name: contentUri
inputs.description: Canonical URI to access the content. The client should then verify that the content has the same hash

inputs.name: contentHash
inputs.description: Keccak256 hash of the content that is linked

inputs.name: author
inputs.description: Author that cryptographically signs the content. 0x0 if not signed

inputs.name: signature
inputs.description: Cryptographic signature of the author. Empty if not signed

abiDocs.name: publishContent
abiDocs.return: Content ID of the newly published content
abiDocs.notice: Saves the content's URI and it's hash into this Newsroom, this creates a new Content and Revision number 0. This function requires ROLE_EDITOR or owner to use. The content can be cryptographicaly secured / approved by author as per signing procedure

abiDocs.name: isRevisionSigned
abiDocs.notice: Returns if that specific revision of the content has the author's signature

abiDocs.name: setName
abiDocs.notice: Changes the user-readable name of this contract. This function can be only called by the owner of the Newsroom

inputs.name: signature
inputs.description: Signature that cryptographically approves this revision. Empty if not approved

abiDocs.name: updateRevision
abiDocs.notice: Updates the existing content with a new revision, the content id stays the same while revision id increases afterwards Requires that the content was first published This function can be only called by ROLE_EDITOR or the owner. The new revision can be left unsigned, even if the previous revisions were signed. If the new revision is also signed, it has to be approved by the same author that has signed the first revision. No signing can be done for articles that were published without any cryptographic author in the first place

abiDocs.name: isContentSigned
abiDocs.notice: Returns if the latest revision of the content at ID has the author's signature associated with it

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
